101.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
desc: Increases Outgoing Healing by #1[i]%.
At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.

102.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
desc: ATK increases by #1[i]%.
The wearer's SPD increases by #1[i]% and Basic ATK DMG increases by #2[i]%.

103.name: Knight of Purity Palace
desc: Increases DEF by #1[i]%.
Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by #1[i]%.

104.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
desc: Increases Ice DMG by #1[i]%.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s).

105.name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
desc: Increases Physical DMG by #1[i]%.
After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by #1[i]% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to #2[i] time(s).

106.name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
desc: Reduces DMG taken by #1[i]%.
At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than #1[i]%, restores HP equal to #2[i]% of their Max HP and regenerates #3[i] Energy.

107.name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
desc: Increases Fire DMG by #1[i]%.
Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by #1[i]%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by #2[i]% for the next attack.

108.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
desc: Increases Quantum DMG by #1[i]%.
When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores #1[i]% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores #2[i]% DEF.

109.name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
desc: Increases Lightning DMG by #1[i]%.
When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s).

110.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
desc: Increases Wind DMG by #1[i]%.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by #1[i]%.

111.name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
desc: Increases Break Effect by #1[i]%.
Increases the wearer's Break Effect by #1[i]%. After the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates #2[i] Energy.

112.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
desc: Increases Imaginary DMG by #1[i]%.
When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by #1[i]%, and their CRIT DMG increases by #2[i]% against Imprisoned enemies.

113.name: Longevous Disciple
desc: Increases Max HP by #1[i]%.
When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s) and up to #3[i] stacks.

114.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
desc: Increases SPD by #1[i]%.
When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

115.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
desc: Increases the DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by #1[i]%.

When the wearer uses follow-up attacks, increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack up to #2[i] time(s) and lasts for #3[i] turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

116.name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
desc: ATK increases by #1[i]%.
For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore #1[i]% of its DEF when dealing DMG to it. This effect is valid for a max of #2[i] DoTs.

117.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
desc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by #1[i]%.

Increases CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. The wearer deals #2[i]%/#3[i]% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least #4[i]/#5[i] debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for #6[i] turn(s).

118.name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
desc: Increases Break Effect by #1[i]%.
When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, all allies' Break Effect increases by #1[i]% for #2[i] turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

301.name: Space Sealing Station
desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]%. When the wearer's SPD reaches #2[i] or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra #3[i]%.

302.name: Fleet of the Ageless
desc: Increases the wearer's Max HP by #1[i]%. When the wearer's SPD reaches #2[i] or higher, all allies' ATK increases by #3[i]%.

303.name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
desc: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by #1[i]%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to #2[i]% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of #3[i]%.

304.name: Belobog of the Architects
desc: Increases the wearer's DEF by #1[i]%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is #2[i]% or higher, the wearer gains an extra #3[i]% DEF.

305.name: Celestial Differentiator
desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by #1[i]%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches #2[i]% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by #3[i]% until the end of their first attack.

306.name: Inert Salsotto
desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches #2[i]% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by #3[i]%.

307.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
desc: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by #1[i]%. When the wearer's SPD reaches #2[i] or higher, the wearer's Break Effect increases by an extra #3[i]%.

308.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
desc: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by #1[i]%. When the wearer's SPD reaches #2[i] or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by #3[i]% immediately upon entering battle.

309.name: Rutilant Arena
desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches #2[i]% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by #3[i]%.

310.name: Broken Keel
desc: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by #1[i]%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at #2[i]% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by #3[i]%.

311.name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than #2[i]/#3[i], the wearer deals #4[i]%/#5[i]% more DMG.

312.name: Penacony, Land of the Dreams
desc: Increases wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by #1[i]%. Increases DMG by #2[i]% for all other allies that are of the same Type as the wearer.

313.name: Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation
desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by #3[i]%. When an enemy target gets defeated, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by #1[i]%, stacking up to #2[i] time(s).

314.name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by #2[i]%.
